meanings.definition: A type of herding dog known for its intelligence and agility.
meanings.sent1: The collies quickly rounded up the sheep in the field.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of collies herding the cattle on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The collies decided to have a race to see who could round up the most toys.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a pack of collies, swiftly and with great precision.
meanings.sent5: The collies moved in perfect unison, a beautiful display of teamwork and skill.
